entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
